summary: Special ops interrogation officer Jimmy Vickers tracks down a gang who slaughtered his parents. With police closing in & his old unit on his trail, he has to to evade capture long enough to complete his gruesome crusade.
cast: Danny Dyer|Vincent Regan|Roxanne McKee|Alistair Petrie|Ricci Harnett|Nick Nevern|Bruce Payne|Emma Samms|Tony Denham|Tamaryn Payne|Michael Ryan|Anna Brecon|Samuel Kane|Simona Roman|Joshua Osei|Ryan Oliva|James Mullinger|Hugo Myatt|Jay Sutherland|Naomi Todd|Roman Kemp|Martin Fisher|Alexis Rodney|Josef Altin|Tiffani Thompson|Jean-Paul Van Cauwelaert|Charlie Bond|Tracy Kirby|Ben Shockley|Dani Dyer|Elijah Baker|Sam Hudson|Jessica Ann Brownlie|Lucy Drive|Nick Thomas-Webster|James Alper|Owen Findlay|Anna Tyrie|Paul Sandgrove|Ramin Karimloo|Israel Oba|Scott Samain|Susan Fordham|Kat Dee|Clair Meek|James Lawrence|Robin Cattani|Amy Clare Beales|Tolo Mas|Stirling Airsoft|Ben Watt|Adam Gray|Leo Mansell|Jeannie Dalton|James Johnston|Dan Tyler|Lewis Salle|Andrew Stevens|Louie Armstrong|Matt Bailey|Brandon Q W McConnell|Stuart Bailey|Richard Banks|Mark Barnett|Paul Blackwell|Patrick Carney Junior|Michael Chapman|Chris Cowlin|John Duggan|John W.G. title: Vendetta
